fields.Title: INITIATION / SMOKING HABIT
fields.Description: Global afterthought dialogue to pick up smoking.

fields.Title: You: "No. Throw it away at the last secon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. Throw it away at the last second. [Ignore thought.]

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You picked the best one! This soldi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You picked the best one! This soldier is fat and succulent. What are you waiting for? Light up -- re-become yourself!

fields.Title: Logic: "Will they *always* be looking, thou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Will they *always* be looking, though? Because they might go to the toilet or you might be in a different...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Shut up. It's already happening..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shut up. It's already happening...

fields.Title: You: "What are the repercussions if I do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are the repercussions if I do this?

fields.Title: You: "Dip that bad boy in the flame and b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dip that bad boy in the flame and breathe in.

fields.Title: Volition: "It only lets you concentrate becaus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It only lets you concentrate because you're in *nicotine withdrawal*. It only mitigates it's own...

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "You've passed up your chance to sta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've passed up your chance to start smoking CIGARETTES for now, but don't worry! The option to start smoking becomes available again in 3 hours.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Thick, warm smoke gets sucked down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thick, warm smoke gets sucked down into your lungs. Immediately you feel a warm nostalgia fill your head, body *and* soul. A nostalgia for *yourself*, the man you were in your youth. Johnny Thundercop is back. And he's chill as balls.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "There it is, a brave little army in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There it is, a brave little army in your pocket. The First Smokes Platoon. Twenty brave souls standing in salute, ready to step into the fire for you, sir...

fields.Title: You: "Light it up!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Light it up!

fields.Title: Jump to: [Electrochemistry: "Already you regret it -- looking at..."]
Electrochemistry: "Get a load of this rock and roll co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get a load of this rock and roll cop here, people! Johnny Thundercop fishes a cheap lighter out of his pants. With a flick of the thumb there's fire, a primal satisfaction. Here we go...

fields.Title: Frittte clerk: ""Hey, you can't smoke in here." The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, you can't smoke in here." The girl's voice betrays little interest or enthusiasm. She doesn't even look up when as she continues: "Please don't fuck with Frittte."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Thick, warm smoke gets sucked down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thick, warm smoke gets sucked down into your lungs. Immediately you feel a warm nostalgia fill your head, body *and* soul. A nostalgia for *yourself*, the man you were in your youth. Johnny Thundercop is back. And he's chill as balls.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Already you regret it -- looking at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Already you regret it -- looking at the pack... But don't worry. You can come back to this later. The army of smokes is honourable and faithful to you. You have your entire *life* to return to it.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Repercussions? There's a high risk..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Repercussions? There's a high risk of GLORY? With a mild chance COOL *GENIUS*. Smoking makes you into an INTELLECTUAL, everybody knows that.

fields.Title: You: "I'm not going to do it. [Ignore tho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm not going to do it. [Ignore thought.]

fields.Title: Logic: "It *will* help you concentrate a bi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It *will* help you concentrate a bit, that much is true.

fields.Title: You: "I don't wanna light it right *now*,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't wanna light it right *now*, people are watching.

fields.Title: You: "Pull one out of the pack."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pull one out of the pack.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The lighter's dark green, disposabl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lighter's dark green, disposable plastic. Safety's off -- in your case, the safety is *always* off.

fields.Title: Idiot Doom Spiral: "The man in the stinking tracksuit n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man in the stinking tracksuit nods solemnly. "Having a well-deserved break from your adventures. It's what we all need sometimes."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Get a load of this rock and roll co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get a load of this rock and roll cop here, people! Johnny Thundercop fishes a cheap lighter out of his pants. With a flick of the thumb there's fire, a primal satisfaction. Here we go...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Shut up and light that shit! You wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shut up and light that shit! You wanna be an idiot for the rest of your life? This shit will give you the cool edge you need.

fields.Title: You: "I already had a heart attack. Maybe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I already had a heart attack. Maybe smokes are harmful?

fields.Title: You: "Put it back in the pack. [Ignore th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Put it back in the pack. [Ignore thought.]

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Oh yes, *bratan*! (The tie is shaki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yes, *bratan*! (The tie is shaking around your neck excitedly.) Please light up. You *need* a trooper between your lips right now! Calm your shit down. Go to Pleasureland. Become a *genius*!

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Step into the light and be reborn i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Step into the light and be reborn in the cleansing flame, *bratan*!

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "No, what's *harmful* is fretting an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, what's *harmful* is fretting and worrying. It's the *stress* that's wearing your ticker down. The smokes will soothe it. They're medicinal.

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "In the bottom right corner of the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the bottom right corner of the screen there's a CIGARETTES button! CIGARETTES give +1 to INTELLECT skills: Logic, Rhetoric, Conceptualization, Visual Calculus, Encyclopedia, and Drama. This is good before a White Check -- but damages your Health.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "...bla bla bla. Boring. Light it up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...bla bla bla. Boring. Light it up!

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "People are watching. What a pussy!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: People are watching. What a pussy! People are *always* watching -- that's what makes it *cool*, now come on!
